data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Callao, Peru who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Callao, Peru

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Callao be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 120,917 believers in Callao and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Callao.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Cujareno, Mashco Piro people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Cujareno, Mashco Piro people know you.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Callao.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Callao, Peru to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 668,534 cultural Christians in the state of Callao to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'
